text: Ezɨ Gersonɨn ikɨzim, me Livain anabamɨn ikɨzir mam, Israelia nguibar ekiar maba me ganɨngi. Me Manasen anabam me tuirazimningɨn ikɨzir faragha zuimɨn nguibar ekiar pumuning isa Gersonɨn adarazigh anɨngi. Aningɨn ziamning kara: Besteran ko Golan, aning Basanɨn Distrighɨn amadaghan itir nguibar ekiamning. Golan a nguibar ekiar gumaziba arɨ mangɨ mongamin mam. A ko Besteran nguibar ekiam. Eghtɨ nguazir nguibar ekiar kamning okarigha itiba, Gersonɨn adarazi uan asɨzibar arɨgham.
